title: Wtb: T206 ray ryan, lajoie with bat
author: BuffettFan

posts.post_title: Wtb: T206 ray ryan, lajoie with bat
posts.post_content:
Like many of us working on the set, I am missing several cards but am looking for a Ray Ryan and Nap Lajoie with Bat in a PSA 4+ grade.

I hope some of you can help and thank you in advance! PM or email (michael at pnre.com) works for me!  I also have a (long) list of PSA/SGC graded cards in mostly PSA 3/SGC 40 or less if you want to send an email for a list.  While a newbie to this site, I can certainly provide references as a great buyer/seller.

Thanks!


Michael:cool:
Still hoping someone can help me find one of these!  Ready to pay market!
